summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WhatsApp AI chatbot MVP - all backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly
passed_tests: Backend API GET /api/wa/status returns JSON with status field (✅ 100%)
Backend API GET /api/wa/qr returns JSON with qr field base64 data URL (✅ 100%)
Backend API GET/POST /api/config for bot configuration (✅ 100%)
Backend API GET /api/stats returns stats object with all required fields (✅ 100%)
Backend API GET /api/logs returns array of log entries (✅ 100%)
Dashboard page loads with stats-grid testid and 4 stats cards (✅ 100%)
Navigation sidebar with all 5 links (Dashboard, Conexão, Conversas, Configurações, Logs) (✅ 100%)
Connection page /connect shows QR code image properly (✅ 100%)
Connection status badge shows AGUARDANDO SCAN as expected (✅ 100%)
Reconnect/Generate QR button (reconnect-btn testid) clickable and functional (✅ 100%)
Config page /config loads with bot-name-input, system-prompt-input, model-select testids (✅ 100%)
Save config button (save-config-btn) submits and shows success toast 'Configurações salvas com sucesso!' (✅ 100%)
Logs page /logs loads logs-terminal with proper structure (✅ 100%)
Chats page /chats loads chats-page element correctly (✅ 100%)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (8/8 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (15/15 UI components and features working)
